price: Kaya kapag umihip sa tambuli nang nag-iisang pag-ihip,
arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ نَفۡخَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fī al-ṣūri nafkhatun wāḥidatun
